pullRequest.body:
- Add results about `Countable`: `countable_left_of_prod_of_nonempty`, `countable_right_of_prod_of_nonempty` and the instance `instCountableProd_1`.
- Add results about `CountableOrCountablyGenerated`: `countableOrCountablyGenerated_left_of_prod_left_of_nonempty`, `countableOrCountablyGenerated_right_of_prod_left_of_nonempty` and the instances `instCountableOrCountablyGeneratedProd`, `instCountableOrCountablyGeneratedProd_1`.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body:
### PR summary [dc7889681b](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/15418/commits/dc7889681bcb213b3eaaecad2b174945765fbc90)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ countableOrCountablyGenerated_left_of_prod_left_of_nonempty`
`+ countableOrCountablyGenerated_prod_left_swap`
`+ countableOrCountablyGenerated_right_of_prod_left_of_nonempty`
`+ countable_left_of_prod_of_nonempty`
`+ countable_prod_swap`
`+ countable_right_of_prod_of_nonempty`
`+ instance [hα : CountableOrCountablyGenerated α γ] [hβ : CountableOrCountablyGenerated β γ] :`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>
Can you fix the build? I mark this as awaiting-author for now.
Do you need this instance for an application? Instances should not be added lightly, as they are one of the main performance bottlenecks in Mathlib. Otherwise, maybe make it a lemma?

I need the one about `CountableOrCountablyGenerated` for a result inside the Testing Lower Bounds project. 
If needed I can turn these two instances into lemmas, then I will have to add a `have` inside the proof of the result in the other project, but since I use it only once it should be fine.
Do you think I should do it?
Let's make it a lemma, yeah

pullRequest.title: feat: Results about `Countable` and `CountableOrCountablyGenerated` for products
